reviews.review: Крутая игра-головоломка, где вам в прямом смысле надо ломать голову, но если у вас iq выше 69 то вы пройдёте это довольно быстро. 10 картошек гладос из 10
still holds up to this day with its fun game play and awesome story
이렇게 완성도 높은 게임이 다시 나올수나 있을까? 개인적으로 난 이게 같은 년도에 나온 스카이림보다 더 잘만들었다고 생각하지만 그때 그런 오픈월드 형식에 게임을 이길 수 없었다는게 참 슬프네 스토리로만 보면 단연 11년도 원탑일텐데..

Игра в которую я мечтала поиграть с самого своего детства, первая видео игра которая взорвала моё воображение, заставила мой мозг работать и научила некоторым техникам в создании персонажа.
я многим обязана ей, и этот пост лишь меньшее что я могу дать ей.
просто спасибо вам, за эту игру. Огромное спасибо.

The game I dreamed of playing since my childhood, the first video game that blew my mind, made my brain work and taught some techniques to create a character.
I owe a lot to her, and this post is just the least I can give her.
just thank you for this game. Thank you so much.
C'est un jeu incroyable avec beacoup de possibilités de niveaux et de créativité
однозначно да , пацаны она стоет большего чем 250 р,покупайте не задумываясь
Great puzzle game with fun story. A worthy successor to first Portal game.

I don't know how I've never written a review for this game after having it for so many years, and I won't be able to say anything other people already haven't but this game is seriously amazing. Such a perfect singleplayer campaign, a extremely fun coop campaign, and workshop content that can extend your playtime forever. The gameplay is much improved over Portal 1 with many new mechanics, the levels are amazing, the story is amazing, everything is just great about this game.
Можно убить время с другом и одному
Très bon jeu. Univers glauque, personnages amusants, énigmes sympatiques.
: qualidades        audio:10     video:10    historia:9 e isso bye
хорошая игра . а главное сложная после нескольких уровней , чтобы пройти нужно серьезно подумать , и это лучшая головоломка которую я встречал . Не пожалел что купил.
Я купил портал ган но еще сама купилась книга за 59 рублей и я их просрал игра хорошая крутая
Игра хорошая с оригинальным сюжетом. Всем советую
эта игра самая лучшая головоломка, советую к покупке
Amazing game for all players regaurdles of play style or gaming experience. 10/10 would recommend.

I love that Portal 2 is longer than it's predecessor.

I didn't like the middle levels where [spoiler] we meet Cave Johnson. I thought it would be longer. [/spoiler]

100%. I wish there was more portal games.

친구 한 명 구해서 같이 하면 재밌습니다
물론 그 친구가 어색한 친구가 아니고 똑똑한 친구도 아닌
재미있고 친한 친구랑 하세요
그럼 재미가 배가 됩니다
Very Very good, would recommend it to anybody as it has great game play, story line and characters.

O melhor da franquia portal, com uma trilha sonora incrivel, uma animação e vozes perfeitas para o universo, com açao e tudo, achei os puzzles umpouco mais faceis que o jogo anterior, porem, são mais completos, e maiores, um jogo bom para se divertir e tmb passar o tempo, com um incrivel modo cooperativo, e MUIIIIIIIIITAS referencias a Half-life

Absolutely amazing. I would highly recommend playing this game with a friend, the duos are really fun and sometimes challenging. Have not started the single player just yet but sure to do so soon. Definitely worth a try.
It's really fun I would recommend if you have played Portal 1 or still alive.

Portal 2 was my first introduction into the Valve universe, and will go down as one of my all time favorite games. If you enjoy puzzle games with an interesting story and dark sociopathic undertones, you're going to love Portal 2! The multiplayer feature also allows you to torture yourself, and your friends by attempting to pass both base game and community made puzzles.

10/10

Прекрасная игра, уже ставшая классикой. Хорошее сочетание головоломки и экшна, причем без крови и пальбы из-за угла. Подойдет даже для неженок.
Кооперативный режим - просто находка по сравнению с прошлой частью. 
Из того, что недолюбливаю - если игра включает кат-сцену, то это надооооолго.
its my favourite game but there should be like a portal game this decade where chell returned because she saw the world and she realized it was the best in there
I've never been so excited for a game release, and had it completely exceed all expectations 9 years after that excitement wore off.

This is one of the few games I have actually played to completion. Good puzzle game. Not too hard, not too easy, 2 levels had to seek help online, but once I learned the trick, was kickin myself lol. Fun concept, cool game, worth the time.
The only way they could possibly improve this game, is to use Ricky Gervais for the voice of Weathley. Besides that, it's just brilliant.

Meilleur jeu Solo
Je modifie plus tard pour raconter
Jamais farão um jogo tão bom quanto esse. Bons quebra-cabeças, história envolvente e divertida. Viciante.
goOd gam good gam Good gamGAME GOOG MONGO LIK GAME GFAME IS GUUD

This game is amazing its better than the 1st portal don't get me wrong the 1st one is good but the 2nd is better and i don't want spoil it because its that good but my only problem is how there is not a 3rd came :(
but apart from that there is multiplayer and you can make your own test chambers so you should buy it its worth it

Ich liebe dieses Spiel 
1.Es ist Offline Spielbar also praktisch wenn man auf einer reise etc ist
2.Es ist mit Controller Kompatibel
3.Es macht extrem viel Spaß
4.Mann kann online oder lokal auch zusammen Spielen

its the second best game ever check portal 1 first

Good gameplay amazing grafics funny voicelines and unexpected plottwist.
Has a good storyline, and still a very solid game 9 years later.

精细的画面，有趣的剧情，复杂的解密，3元就能体验，很推荐
还有合作关卡和自定义关卡功能，买到就是赚到
This is a very good strategy game. The graphics are very detailing.

РЕКОМЕНДУЮ ВСЕМ !! Это не простая головоломка это шикарная история от valve, которую можно поставить на один уровень с историей Half life. Лучшая игра которую я знаю. Но немного коротковата, хотя это не проблема ведь в игре есть кооперативный режим. А так же можно поиграть в карты от сообщества или сделать свою. [ надеюсь Valve всё же сделают 3 часть ]  [ к слову я проходил игру 5 раз до того как приобрёл её в стим ]

C'est le meilleur jeu Valve de tous les temps pour sont scénario et son humour ainsi que ce coop. J'ai eu beaucoup d'émotion quand j'ai finit le jeu la première fois même si j'ai toujours des frissons dans le dos pour son ambiance et son humour pour le personnage Weathley ainsi que GLADOS. En conclusion ce jeu est parfait et il le restera pour moi.
What the hell is wrong with the mouse??

This is the best game ever created i love it is so fun funny and has very intesting puzzles that you just wish the game would go on forever I expeshaly love chaper 5 wher chell and wheatly excape and destroy the place I have com pleted this game about 10 times in the 5 of so year that I have had it
great classic game need to make new age version
